languages.text: "Нужно сменить подход. Перевяжите его раны, выдайте еды. Побеседуйте вежливо, по-доброму".
"We need to change our approach. Bandage his wounds and give him food. Talk to him gently and with kindness."
languages.original_text: "Нужно сменить подход. Перевяжите его раны, выдайте еды. Побеседуйте вежливо, по-доброму".

traits.locale_text: "We need to change our approach. Bandage his wounds, give him food. Talk to him sweetly and kindly."
"We need to change our approach. Bandage his wounds, give him food. Talk to him sweetly and kindly."
"We need to change our approach. Bandage his wounds and give him food. Talk to him gently and with kindness."
"We need to change our approach. Bandage his wounds and give him food. Talk to him gently and with kindness."
"We need to change our approach. Bandage his wounds and give him food. Talk to him gently and with kindness."
"We need to change our approach. Bandage his wounds and give him food. Talk to him gently and with kindness."
"We need to change our approach. Bandage his wounds and give him food. Talk to him gently and with kindness."

languages.text: "Wir müssen unsere Vorgehensweise ändern. Versorgt seine Wunden und gebt ihm etwas zu essen. Redet freundlich mit ihm."
languages.original_text: "We need to change our approach. Bandage his wounds and give him food. Talk to him gently and with kindness."

traits.locale_text: "Wir müssen unsere Vorgehensweise ändern. Versorgt seine Wunden und gebt ihm etwas zu essen. Redet freundlich mit ihm."

languages.text: « Nous devons changer d'approche. Pansez ses blessures et donnez-lui à manger. Parlez-lui avec douceur et faites preuve de gentillesse. »
languages.original_text: "We need to change our approach. Bandage his wounds and give him food. Talk to him gently and with kindness."

traits.locale_text: « Nous devons changer d'approche. Pansez ses blessures et donnez-lui à manger. Parlez-lui avec douceur et faites preuve de gentillesse. »

languages.text: «Hemos de cambiar el enfoque. Que le venden las heridas y le den de comer. Trátelo con amabilidad y gentileza».
languages.original_text: "We need to change our approach. Bandage his wounds and give him food. Talk to him gently and with kindness."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos de cambiar el enfoque. Que le venden las heridas y le den de comer. Trátelo con amabilidad y gentileza».

languages.text: 「アプローチを変える必要がある。傷に包帯を巻き、食事を与えてやれ。優しく親切に話しかけてやるんだ」
languages.original_text: "We need to change our approach. Bandage his wounds and give him food. Talk to him gently and with kindness."

traits.locale_text: 「アプローチを変える必要がある。傷に包帯を巻き、食事を与えてやれ。優しく親切に話しかけてやるんだ」

languages.text: “我们得换个方法试试。替他包扎伤口，给他东西吃，以温柔、友善的方式和他说话。”
languages.original_text: "We need to change our approach. Bandage his wounds and give him food. Talk to him gently and with kindness."

traits.locale_text: “我们得换个方法试试。替他包扎伤口，给他东西吃，以温柔、友善的方式和他说话。”

languages.text: "Yaklaşımımızı değiştirmeliyiz. Yaralarını sarıp yiyecek bir şeyler verin. Nazikçe, şefkatle konuşun."
languages.original_text: "We need to change our approach. Bandage his wounds and give him food. Talk to him gently and with kindness."
